name: Basic Sword
description: The sword, the noblest weapon. Has balanced stats and skills, mainly physical oriented.

name: Basic Axe
description: The perfect weapon for people looking to wreak havoc. Stats and skills are physic oriented.

name: Basic Spear
description: An original weapon capable of easily punching holes in monsters. Stats and skills are physic oriented.

name: Basic Staff
description: The staff of all apprentice magicians. Stats and skills are magic oriented.

name: Basic Mace
description: A weapon not only used to strike but also to cast spells. Stats and skills are are mostly physical with some magic.
